official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require renal dialysis facilities to make services available on a 24-hour basis as a condition of participation under the medicare program.
short_title: Elizabeth A. Greeson Dialysis Coverage Act of 1993

summary.text: Elizabeth A. Greeson Dialysis Coverage Act of 1993 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require renal dialysis facilities to make institutional dialysis services and supplies available on a 24-hour basis.

titles.title: Elizabeth A. Greeson Dialysis Coverage Act of 1993
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require renal dialysis facilities to make services available on a 24-hour basis as a condition of participation under the medicare program.
